Name: Dr. B. J. Shah

PrincipalMessages.Message:
I am delighted to welcome you to Government Engineering College. I hope to convey the passion and enthusiasm that both staff and students bring to you, and all that they do here, making Government Engineering College a wonderful place to learn.
In order to accomplish our vision and mission, we are prepared to take as much effort as possible for the betterment of academic scenario in India. The purpose of education is to teach our students to think and develop a capacity to reason out facts and this is achieved by providing them excellent academic environment, state-of-the-art infrastructure, state-of-the-art laboratories and dedicated and highly qualified faculty members with decades of teaching and industrial experience.
I wish the best of fortune, peace and prosperity to all those who contribute to the noble task of spreading education and its manifest qualities.

Experiences.Place: L. D. College of Engg., Ahmedabad
L. D. College of Engg., Ahmedabad
L. D. College of Engg., Ahmedabad

Achievements: Recipient of Principal S. B. Junarkar Gold Medal for highest marks in subject of Design of Structures, B.E. Civil, from Sardar Patel University, 1988
Member & Chairman of GTU- Board of Study of Civil Engg. & Allied branches from 2024 onward and Member of BOS of Civil & Environment Engg. Branch from 2018 to 2023
Member & Chairperson of GTU-Doctoral Research Committee of Civil Engg. & Allied branches of Gujarat Technological University from 2024 onward
Member of Gujarat Council of Professional Civil Engineers, Gandhinagar (2020 - 2026)
Research Supervisor of Ph. D. Program of Gujarat Technological University from the year 2011
Research Supervisor of 06 Ph. D. Students and Supervisor of 12 Post graduate students for their Master thesis
Peer Reviewer of 06 Journals & Conferences proceedings
Author of a text book on “Mechanics of Solid” published by Tata McGraw Hill, 20
Author of more than 35 technical papers in various technical journals and proceeding of conferences and seminars

Worked as expert in various committees in All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE), Gujarat technological University (GTU), other reputed universities, Gujarat Public Service, Commission (GPSC), Education Department & Directorate of Technical Education of Govt. Of Gujarat

Worked as Officer on Special Duty at State level admission committee “Admission Committee for Professional Courses (ACPC)” for engineering admission from 2006 to 2014 and Fee Regulatory Committee (FRC) from 2008 to 2014
